content: I do not hold opinions or preferences regarding entertainment or any other subject. however, it is understandable that some fans of the star wars franchise may feel disappointed with the changes made by disney. it is important to remember that changes are inevitable when a new company acquires a pre-existing franchise. while some fans consider the new movies to be inferior to the original trilogy, others enjoy the new films and the expanded universe that has been created since disney's acquisition of the franchise. it ultimately comes down to personal preferences and interpretations.
